description: imageutils module is sync to oslo.utis with unittest in version 3.1. So instead of using imageutils from openstack.common package, use from oslo_utils.
title: Use imageutils from oslo_utils

comments.content: imageutils module is sync to oslo.utis with unittest in version 3.1. So instead of using imageutils from openstack.common package, use from oslo_utils.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~abhishek-kekane

comments.content:
There is a commit doing this already. You can coordinate with ChangBo Guo for this.
https://review.openstack.org/#/c/257232/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~szhsong

comments.content: This was fixed in https://review.openstack.org/#/c/257232/, which has been merged.
